definition: a tall perennial woody plant having a main trunk and branches forming a distinct elevated crown, stretch (a shoe) on a shoetree
details:
noun
- a tall perennial woody plant having a main trunk and branches forming a distinct elevated crown
- a figure that branches from a single root
= example: a figure that branches from a single root
= synonyms: tree diagram
verb
- stretch (a shoe) on a shoetree
= synonyms: shoetree
- chase an animal up a tree
= example: chase an animal up a tree
- plant with trees
= example: plant with trees
- force a person or an animal into a position from which he cannot escape
= synonyms: corner
